examples: She was hit on the head by flying debris.
These worms feed on plant debris.
The tank exploded, scattering debris all over the field.
Teams of people are working to clear the debris. Remember to clear the drain of debris regularly.
Police have spent the day sifting throught the debris for clues.
Debris accumulates at the bottom of the bottle.
She found a pair of children's shoes among the debris.
